name: Band of Badasses
description:
Are you Badass enough to save the world?!
Choose one of 6 awesome action heroes and begin an endless running & shooting adventure to free Earth from alien invaders!

FEATURES:
- Play with iconic badass characters to rediscover archetypal movie heroes from the '90s and 2000s, each with their own offbeat style and personality!
- Run and shoot your way through hordes of aliens and other treacherous obstacles to collect medals and power-ups, and save humanity!
- Enjoy intuitive controls! Tap with one finger to jump, double jump, dash and avoid obstacles!
- Charge across wild and whimsical environments, from the Jungle to the Desert and even Alien Spaceships, all presented in beautiful 2D graphics!
- Set a high score on the Global and Friends Leaderboards to show who's really saving Earth from invasion!
